data.eml:eml: Systematic review of the neotropical shovelnose catfish genus Sorubim Cuvier (Siluriformes: Pimelodidae).

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Michael W. Littmann (2007): Systematic review of the neotropical shovelnose catfish genus Sorubim Cuvier (Siluriformes: Pimelodidae). Zootaxa 1422: 1-29, URL: http://www.zoobank.org/urn:lsid:zoobank.org:pub:1CCCAEFE-5AEB-4489-94D3-0E5BCBB65DB1
